"A.P.241/3/23 10:30":
"Well done, <%me>!
We're still not quite sure what happened, but it's unlikely we'll see it again."
"Once again, I'll share the information I have about the planet we just transferred to."
"It appears that you ended up in a universe where Oracle does not exist, slightly offset from us in subspace."
"That planet is found nowhere in our universe. It's likely that you visited an entirely separate dimension. A whole new world, you could say."

"But travelling to a place like that and back shouldn't be as easy as it was...
We'll need to investigate how that happened."
"That planet is one of many in that alternate dimension, and it is a place where other intelligent life exists."
"This new planet's name is... \"Earth.\""
"By the way... When you visited Earth briefly, I'm sure you recall communicating with Hitsugi to be rather second nature."
"I've just finished gathering data on Earth's language."
"As soon as this debriefing is over, I'll try to pry some info out of the Intelligence Division's hands."
"They're just kinda not giving it to us unless it becomes relevant. Commander Ulc was right... this is fishy. Stinky fishy!"
"We're even having trouble anchoring Earth's transfer coordinates as it is."
"All of that aside, we have more important matters to discuss!"
"After all, it's thanks to the efforts of <%me> and Hitsugi that we may begin to bridge the divide between Oracle and Earth!"
"Though, there's the question of how to send you there without proper coordinates... I'm not sure myself."
"It seems like your desire to save Hitsugi triggered a Photon response which helped transfer you over to Earth."
"Wow, I've really gone off topic. Well, you should be able to travel to Earth now. But we're still investigating, so keep our activities a secret."
"Optical Camouflage and Spatial Quarantine measures have been employed, so you should be able to operate without alerting the Earthlings... Probably."
"Since this technology came from the Intelligence Division, I still don't fully trust it."
"The technology is said to be made possible by Transparent Blade Mai's latent abilities, but it all seems sketchy."
"Problems are popping up left and right and all around. We'll have to double our investigation efforts!"
"Oh! That's right, I forgot! I've got another important piece of information!"
"We have lost trace of the Dark Falz-like presence that appeared on Naberius."
"I've ordered a pursuit, but frankly speaking, odds are slim. I'm sorry."
"However! The silver lining is that when you and Hitsugi came into contact, you formed a link!"
"1. Contact?"
"2. What is a link?"
"Don't you remember? When you tried to save Hitsugi, your hands came into contact."
"During that brief contact, some of your Photons flowed into her, letting us capture her signature."
"It's thanks to that that we were able to trace her in time to save her."
"It also allowed us to sniff around Earth to gather intel. Two birds with one stone!"
"With ARKS' advanced technology, it would be easy to look into her daily life! Hehehe... What scenes would you want to see?"
"1. Isn't that peeping?"
"2. In that case..."
"No, no! This is all for the sake of gathering information for Xiao-- I swear on my honor! It's perfectly fine!"
"Besides... Only the two of us will ever see it, so there's nothing to worry about."
"Well, the information we can get from doing this is inconsistent and fragmented. There's no telling if even Xiao could predict what we'll end up seeing."
"So close, yet so far... How disappointing!"
"All jokes aside, collecting information is vital. There's abundant intelligent life there, after all!"
"We may accidentally peep into some private moments, but it's in the name of research. I'll do my best to sift through the info!"
"The next day."
"ARKS Quest [Phantom Repulsion: Tokyo] was received."
"-Guardian's Awakening-"
"Time to Wake Up"
